title: Gamux CNC 197 Gearbox DH prototype alloy World Cup downhill bike you can pre-order now!
content:
After years of World Cup racing, Swiss bike company Gamux started offering their own customizable alloy Runi trail and Marca downhill bikes in 2020, but are now taking aluminum to new extremes with this all CNC-machined Gearbox DH prototype. Tested in a couple of iterations on the race circuit this season, the CNC 197 Gearbox

The post Gamux CNC 197 Gearbox DH prototype alloy World Cup downhill bike you can pre-order now! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
